items.title: Johnson & Johnson’s (JNJ) Defensive Strength Shines Among the Dogs of the Dow
items.description: Johnson & Johnson (NYSE:JNJ) is included among the 11 Dogs of the Dow Dividend Stocks to Buy Now. Johnson & Johnson (NYSE:JNJ) has a sizable and broadly positioned operation, with strong representation in both the medical devices and pharmaceutical sectors. Its leading status in the industry is also supported by its robust efforts in research […]
